Blog.post: poor cat, without it's tail, went into a trash can just to seek for food...

So quiet Another wasted night The television steals the conversation Exhale Another wasted breath Again it goes unnoticed Please tell me you're just feeling tired 'cause if it's more than that I fear that I might break Out of touch out of time Please send me anything but signals that are mixed 'cause I can't read your rolling eyes Out of touch are we out of time Close lipped Another goodnight kiss Is robbed of all its passion Your grip Another time is slack It leaves me feeling empty Please tell me you're just feeling tired 'cause if it's more than that I feel that I might break Out of touch out of time Please send me anything but signals that are mixed 'cause I can't read your rolling eyes Out of touch are we out of time I'll wait until tomorrow Maybe you'll feel better then Maybe we'll be better then So what's another day When I can't bear these nights of thoughts of going on without you This mood of yours is temporary It seems worth the wait To see you smile again Out of the corner of your eye Won’t be the only way you're looking at me then So quiet Another wasted night The television steals the conversation Exhale Another wasted breath Again it goes unnoticed
(I am a man who would fight for your honor, I'll be the hero you're dreaming of)[the glory of love]
"I begged you not to go. I begged you, I pleaded. Claimed you as my only hope And watched the floor as you retreated"

sometimes just wish i could kill myself & not hurt anyone else or make them worry... i will never ever forgive myself for what i did... im really very sorry that i stood you up... don really know myself anymore... that wasn't da frist time i stood you up... my life is sinking, you're worring & hoping... my mind is hidding in da shadows of my head... digging for da time... i cried, cried wonderin if your fine, wondering was i there to comfort you... 'one life avant la fin' ... im doing my best to not make you worry but everytime im close i fall back down fast... my mind is killing me slowly, my body has become weaker day by day... don wanna lose those i hold dear... hold me tight so i can rest in your arms & find peace with myself... happiness in you is da only way my worries are calm... ' love you always my dear'

what has happen to me? everything doesn seem rite... im makin everyone around me get into trouble, makin them upset, unhappy, pissed, hate, angry with me... what m i here for? what is my purpose? maybe im all used up & just waiting for da time to go... what is this, what m i talking about? m i ever making sense? will i ever put thing rite? im so lost? will i ever make it through this year or just pass on just like a shadow without it's light to live... m i like that? do i need a light to live? a source to live? or m i just a wolf in a sheep's clothing? i always knew i wasn't da person who poeple see me to be... i know myself better... do i or does somebody else? my parents? my frens? my galfren? my sister? i m who i m, im not what you want me to be, im not that great of a person... im gone, disappear, dead, pass on, free or m i???

WOW!!! today i was so happy as i gave my galfren a gift which was what you can see in my last post... hahaha... guess i took her by surprise as she could stop thanking me... 'well dear it was nothing as it was a little sumthing from my heart'... 'just hope you love it'... later in da day i was overwhelm by her kindness... so love her so very much... wouldn't wanna let go of this feeling...
from me to you
taken on 9th July

(Hands down, this is the best day I can ever remember I'll always remember the sound of the stereo, The dim of the soft lights, the scent of your hair That you twirled in your fingers And the time on the clock when we realized it's so late And this walk that we shared together The streets were wet and the gate was locked So I jumped it, and let you in And you stood at your door with your hands on my waist And you kissed me like you meant it And I knew that you meant itThat you meant it, that you meant it And I knew that you meant it, that you meant it.) .....that was what happen during my day with my galfren(im flyin wifout my wings) i love u « ¤ ñÜ®Å ¤ »™

damn i jus had my oral 'N'level... i really think i screw it up... never felt so stupid in front of other school teachers before... hmmm... but they were frenly... anywho im still not home free... damn whoever invented exams... prelims are like next mth... gee... my art work is due da ending of this mth... pray for a betta tomorrow...

yesterday evening was a boys nite out for me as Nick(my guitarist) was askin da band to go watch & watch movie wif him... we did & da movie was Mean Gals... okay it good but why would three boys wanna watch a gal movie... mayb bcos tat other two are gays but i highly tink so... da best part was was before da show started as three guys took our seats, so we didn had a choice but 2 take theirs'... idoits, anyway thier seats were betta den ours so screw them... hahahaha... so for those who didn watch or wanna watch my rating is five stars... it's a tumbs up movie... well i cant say i didn enjoy da show...

hohoho... what a day it was yesterday as it was sport's day & it rain in da middle of da last few events... 'but alls well ends well' as everyones' a winner... hehehe my galfren won 2nd for 4x400m relay & 3rd place for short putt... her frens too did won some medals but if im not wrong it was in da same event... oritez... before prize giving Has(da one sitting on da floor) was so into this photos taking business(u can view some of her photos on da link)... proud of u all who won, take part & support... for those who didn know my galfren runs they should have been there to witness it... WOW look at her go(like like her pants was on fire) as she overtake 3-2 other runners...
clockwise: Nick(guitar), Beng(drums), Kel(guitar) & Null(bass)
Yahoo... tis is my 1st time bloggin... needa get use 2 it... anywho yesterday was my one month anniversary wif ma galfren... time sure flys & now everyones' growing older...

Roman candles that burn in the night Yeah, you are a shining light You lit a torch in the infinite Yeah, you are a shining light Yeah, you light up my life You've always been a thorn in their side But to me you're a shining light You arrive and the night is alive Yeah, you are a shining light Yeah, you light up my life We made our connection A full on chemical reaction Brought by dark divine intervention Yeah, you are a shining light A constellation once seen Over Royal David's city An epiphany you burn so pretty Yeah, you are a shining light You are a force, you are a constant source Yeah you are a shining light Incandescent in the darkest night Yeah you are shining light My mortal blood I would sacrifice For you are a shining light Sovereign bride of the infinite Yeah, you are a shining light Yeah, you light up my life We made our connection A full on chemical reaction Brought by dark divine intervention Yeah, you are a shining light A constellation once seen Over Royal David's city An epiphany you burn so pretty Yeah, you are a shining light And these are days you often say There's nothing that we can't do Beneath a canopy of stars I'd shed blood for you The north star in the firmament You shine the most bright I've seen you draped in an electric veil Shrouded in celestial light We made our connection A full on chemical reaction Brought by dark divine intervention Yeah, you are a shining light A constellation once seen Over Royal David's city An epiphany you burn so pretty Yeah, you are a shining light Yeah, you light up my life Yeah, you are a shining light Yeah, you light up my life
USE ME AS YOU MAY, TRUST ME AS YOU WISH, JUDGE ME AS YOU PLEASE

have i change?? i don know myself... if i did then why am i still lost in my mind?? what is this feeling i have in me?? why can't i let it out?? i should be feeling easier but why i still feel tight?? haiz... what can i do with myself?? i would really love to make things be better but everything in life needs time... would i have the time to wait?? or just go unnoticed?? weaker and weaker i become, days pass like weeks, older i become to make my own choices in life... to choose the life i wanna live in... i'll see you when i get there...
believe me when i tell you that i didn mean to hurt you... believe me when i tell you that i don wish to make you cry... i just want the best for you... i know you'll understand...

hmmm... a wonderful discovery that she has a sexy yet scary voice when she's sick... hehehe... well i must say i was kinda turn on about it... cheeky when we were over at river valley checking out cool toys... saw like the whole collection of KISS toys... damn gene simmons is so cool... gosh wish i had cash... but i will be spending on toys which i don't even know where to display... hohoho...
